content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI attempted to execute the "execute_shell" command, which returned the output "90." I received two empty command inputs. My assistant encountered errors with the "command" object and requested more information on what to do next. My assistant suggested exploring the operating system to determine what tasks I can accomplish, and also learning about martial arts. The assistant provided plans for both suggestions, including using the "list_files" and "execute_shell" commands to explore the file system, and using the "browse_website" command to search for information on martial arts. The assistant also warned about not neglecting other tasks while learning about martial arts.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text discusses the different styles and philosophies of martial arts, including traditional/historical arts vs. contemporary styles, armed vs. unarmed techniques, and self-defense vs. combat sport vs. physical fitness applications. Unarmed martial arts can be further grouped into those focusing on strikes, grappling, or both, while armed martial arts encompass a wide range of melee weapons. Some martial arts also incorporate religion and spirituality, with meditation and philosophical beliefs playing a role in training. The text also covers the origins and evolution of martial arts into sports, their use in military and law enforcement, and the global industry of millions of practitioners. The text mentions various styles and origins of martial arts from different countries and regions, as well as different techniques and weapons used in martial arts. \n \n Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martial_arts#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']"}]
"""
